name: Project Apocalypse (itch)
description:
Release dates

Pre-Alpha 1.11.0 is available now !  Pre-Alpha 1.11.0: Full change log

Project Apocalypse is a Survival First Person Shooter who take place in a fictional city with stylized graphics !
Play with more than 30 different weapons, grenades and melee weapons to survive and free this city from zombies and bandits !

Here is the roadmap for this game (The red point indicates the current state):
